summary: A scientist makes a coat with natural powers. The coat lands in the hands of Pushkar who will use it to win the heart of his lady love.
cast: Pushkar Jog|Manasi Naik|Sanjay Narvekar|Makarand Anaspure|Kishori Ambiye|Priya Arun Berde|Abhiram Bhadkamkar|Vijay Chavan|Bharat Jadhav|Siddarth Jadhav|Rasika Joshi|Mahesh Kothare|Santosh Pawar|Aditya Redij|Sanjiv Talpade|Sunil Tawde|Yohana Vachhani
title: Zabardast
